faqs.question: What skin types is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum suitable for?
faqs.answer: It is suitable for Oily, Combination skin types.

faqs.question: What is the concentration of Vitamin C in GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
What are the key ingredients in GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
How should I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum in my daily routine?
faqs.answer: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

faqs.question: Can I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum in the morning?
faqs.answer: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

faqs.question: Should I apply sunscreen after using GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

faqs.question: Can I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum with other skincare products?
faqs.answer: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

faqs.question: Are there any side effects when using GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: Mild tingling for sensitive skin. Patch test before first use if your skin is sensitive.
